lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry has resumed light shooting without movement on his injured right knee with the hopes he can get into scrimmages by later next week, perhaps in time to be ready for Game 3 of the Golden State Warriors' Western Conference semifinals at Portland.

headline.print_headline: Stephen Curry Resumes Light Shooting on Injured Right Knee
headline.main: Stephen Curry Resumes Light Shooting on Injured Right Knee
